detailedSummary: Days of the week in Arabic: al-ithnayn (Monday), al-thulatha' (Tuesday), al-arba'a' (Wednesday), al-khamis (Thursday), al-jum'a (Friday), al-sabt (Saturday), al-ahad (Sunday).
whyItMatters: Mastering Days of the Week is essential for building a strong foundation in arabic - these basic concepts are the first building blocks for all future language learning.
